sn4.11:2.1: 2. Dutiyavagga
sn4.11:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
sn4.11:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā rattandhakāratimisāyaṃ abbhokāse nisinno hoti, devo ca ekamekaṃ phusāyati.
sn4.11:4.3: Atha kho māro pāpimā bhagavato bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃsaṃ uppādetukāmo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn4.11:4.4: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato avidūre mahante pāsāṇe padālesi.
sn4.11:5.1: Atha kho bhagavā “māro ayaṃ pāpimā” iti viditvā māraṃ pāpimantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn4.11:6.1: * “Sacepi kevalaṃ sabbaṃ,
sn4.11:6.2: gijjhakūṭaṃ calessasi;
sn4.11:7.1: Atha kho māro pāpimā “jānāti maṃ bhagavā, jānāti maṃ sugato”ti dukkhī dummano tatthevantaradhāyīti.
